nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the values for `admin`, `rewardNonce`, an 'Id' for the 
erc20 and erc721 checks, as well as a balance threshold for
erc20 checks.
These values are immutable: they can only be set once during
construction.

and returns whether they have equality or not.

devdoc.details: Main contract which handles posting bounties,  claiming bounties, and storing mappings of  claims, address, and source addresses.

approve(address,address).details: A claimant ('_approver') grants permission to an approved party ('_approved') to view the claimant's claims.

returns._0: If the function call is successful or reverted.

params._identification: The bounty nonce when it was posted.

returns.success: If the transaction was successful or reverted.

constructor.details: Sets the values for `admin`, `rewardNonce`, an 'Id' for the  erc20 and erc721 checks, as well as a balance threshold for erc20 checks. These values are immutable: they can only be set once during construction.

isRewardClaimant(address,uint256).details: A public function to see if a claimant owns a bounty reward.

returns._0: If the claimant has claimed the bounty ('_identification').

isRewardPoster(address,uint256).details: A public function to see if an address is the poster of a bounty.

returns._0: If the address has posted the bounty ('_identification').

postReward(address,string,bool,bool).details: `msg.sender` Posts a bounty reward 'reward' which is linked to a contract address.

params._erc20: A bool to check if _source has an erc20 standard interface.
params._erc721: A bool to check _source has an erc721 standard interface.
params._reward: The bounty reward - just a string. Could be a hash, or a private key to a wallet.
params._source: The contract address which the bounty is linked to.

returns.id: The unique identifier of the posted bounty.
